infos.value: Show yourselves.
...It’s all been tidied up so neatly. You’d almost think there had never been a battle here at all...
However...
The smell of blood still hangs in the air.
I promise...I will do all I can to ensure you did not die in vain.
Lord Vadim...what is our next move?
We rescue Viktora and Luartha.
Both are very skilled.
I doubt even Khury could kill them so easily.
In that case, should we head into the dungeon?
Right.
With any luck, the First Sword of Hourne, Schuzelt, awaits us there, too...
With him on our side, we would stand a chance of defeating Khury.
We would more than just stand a chance. And not only with him...
...What do you mean?
I've kept quiet about it until now, but Serjes and I are old friends.
Serjes...? Of Wezette’s first division, «Equito»?
The very same.
Once he moves out, our victory is guaranteed.
...Let’s move out.
Once we reach the dungeon...Khury’s head is as good as ours!
...Yes, sir!
